subject: Football
Bowl Games
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Michael Adams, the president of the University of Georgia, said he would use his position as the chair of the N.C.A.A.’s executive committee to push for an eight-team playoff.
snippet: Michael Adams, the president of the University of Georgia, said he would use his position as the chair of the N.C.A.A.’s executive committee to push for an eight-team playoff.
